articles.title: Bullet train project picks pace after change of regime in Maharashtra
articles.description: With a change in government in the state, the bullet train project, which lost a couple of years, has gained momentum. The project had stalled because of differences between the Centre and the state after the MVA came to power

articles.author: Prafulla Marapakwar
articles.title: Maharashtra: No cross-voting by Congress & NCP MLAs in President election, says Sharad Pawar
articles.description: The Sharad Pawar-led NCP on Friday claimed there was no cross-voting by Congress and NCP legislators in the July 18 presidential poll though CM Eknath Shinde had claimed NDA candidate Droupadi Murmu would get over 200 votes from Maharashtra.

articles.title: Karnataka: Ecstasy pills factory raided in Kolar; seven arrested, equipment seized
articles.description: An illegal narcotics laboratory, which was manufacturing and supplying ecstasy pills to drug traffickers operating in Chennai, Hyderabad and other cities, has been busted in Kolar.
